dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright/Trademark Infringement]
dmca.body:
T

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 15, 2006 2:53 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; rob@cubed3d.co.uk
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright/Trademark Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright/Trademark Infringement
Date:         Sat, 14 Jan 2006 02:22:28 -0000
From:         Rob Hall <rob@cubed3d.co.uk>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



To Whom It May Concern

I write to you to inform you of a copyright/trademark infringement on a
website hosted on your servers.
www.mygen.us <http://www.mygen.us> - This website is unlawfully using my
registered trademark MyGen, (www.mygen.co.uk <http://www.mygen.co.uk>) and
passing it as their own, making money from my good name.
I have contacted the webmaster in question, but they don't seem to be taking
this matter at all seriously, hence my reason for contacting yourselves.
Could you please investigate this as a matter of urgency, as I'd really like
to avoid the legal path, but my company is losing revenue as a result of
this infringement.

Many Thanks
Robert Hall
MyGen(TM)

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDyrYkvK/XpJs6oyURAozWAJ9OiYUZY5F0REqwQHU4AhhfialSgQCfSCYI
GQyxAlxi6vRUSZuXrDMBZCQ=
=CN/p
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
